properties.notes: sold - Owner moved to aged care facility in 2020. House left vacant (not rented). No other property treated as main residence. Selling after 5+ years in aged care.

user_query: I moved into an aged care home 5 years ago. My old house has been sitting empty ever since - I never rented it out. I'm now selling it to pay for my care. Do I still get the main residence exemption even though I haven't lived there for years?
